UpdateLog.description:
[anchor]MiddleCenter[/anchor][b]Vehicles - 1.2.3.1 (Hotfix)[/b][anchor]MiddleLeft[/anchor] [title]Bug Fixes[/title][font]Tiny[/font] Fixed bug where HEX field in ColorPicker dialog window did not accept any user input.
Fixed bug where vehicle would (rarely) attempt to melee back at a target
[title]New Additions[/title]
[title]Additional Changes[/title] Greatly lowered SoundDef volume for cannon firing and water splashing.
Changed how things are ejected from vehicles. Pawns and items will now spawn outside the hitbox, continuing outward in a radial but random pattern. [title]Final Notes[/title]
Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.)
